title: How can farmers deliver on EU Green Deal environmental commitments? | - Open Access Government
summary: The EU Green Deal sets ambitious environmental commitments for farmers, aiming to reduce their carbon footprints and encourage sustainable practices.  The article outlines various ways farmers can contribute, including implementing land-use change strategies, adopting soil management techniques, conserving water, and protecting biodiversity. It also discusses financial support and incentives available to farmers, as well as the implications of the Green Deal for farmers in other countries.

title: The UK's investment in environmental science - Open Access Government
summary: The UK is investing heavily in environmental science to address climate change and environmental degradation.  This includes funding research into climate resilience, clean energy technologies, and sustainable resource management.  The government also supports the development of green business models and encourages companies to adopt environmentally friendly practices.

title: D2C Brand Pilgrim Forays into the Hair Care Segment, Launches Its New Range - Indian Retailer
summary: Juicy Chemistry and Mommy Shots by Amrita launched a campaign called 'Scars are Beautiful' celebrating postpartum bodies and stretch marks.  The campaign features 11 mothers displaying their bodies and sharing their motherhood experiences to inspire women to embrace their bodies and change societal perceptions. The goal is to promote self-love and body positivity and encourage women to see their bodies as beautiful and strong, no matter their shape or size.

title: Top 20 Best Metal Ore Mining Companies In India 2023 - Inventiva
summary: The article highlights the top 20 metal ore mining companies in India, focusing on their contributions to the economy and their commitment to sustainable practices. These companies, including Vedanta Limited, Hindalco Industries, and Tata Steel, are investing in advanced technologies and environmental protection measures to increase efficiency and minimize their impact. They are also actively involved in social initiatives, improving the lives of communities surrounding their mining operations.
